org.liortamir.ariel.javalab.menuhandler

Class AbstractMenuHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.liortamir.ariel.javalab.menuhandler.AbstractMenuHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExitMenuHandler, VectorAdditionHandler, VectorCartesianMultiplicationHandler, VectorScalarMultiplicationHandler

    public abstract class AbstractMenuHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for all handlers
    Supplies ReadFile VectorBuilder for customHandler(VectorBuilder, ReadFile)
    and printVector(Vector)
    Author:
    liort

                                   ReadFile file)
                            throws VectorException
        abstract method to implement vector logic
        Parameters:
        builder - VectorBuilder to create a vector
        file - ReadFile to read the data from
        Throws:

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
